original_text: And they were all filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other tongues as the Spirit gave them utterance.
korean_text: 그들이 다 성령의 충만함을 받고 성령이 말하게 하심을 따라 다른 언어들로 말하기를 시작하니라

sentences.original_text: And they were all filled with the Holy Spirit
and began to speak in other tongues
as the Spirit gave them utterance
